Running all the tests (headless-browser and node.js)

npm install
npm test

Running the browser-based tests

npm install
node server.js

Then go to http://localhost:8083/.

Testing Require.js optimised version of the JavaScript

npm install -g requirejs
r.js -o build.js

You will now have a single optimised JS file at ui/test.min.js, containing the tests and all the forge dependencies.

Now edit ui/index.html and change data-main="test" to data-main="test.min", then reload http://localhost:8083/.

Building a minimized single file for all forge modules

npm install -g requirejs
r.js -o minify.js

You will now have forge.min.js, in the ‘js’ directory, which will contain all forge modules.
